name: bulk lead-zinc concentrate to generic markets for zinc concentrate and lead concentrate | zinc concentrate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20150/documentation

This is a linking activity which links the product bulk lead-zinc concentrate to the generic markets for zinc concentrate and lead concentrate. The bulk lead-zinc concentrate provides a function that is equivalent to a mix of zinc concentrate and lead concentrate.

This activity starts with the reception of bulk lead-zinc concentrate, produced in a zinc mine.

This activity ends with the supply of zinc concentrate and lead concentrate to their respective markets. As this is a linking activity, and therefore does not represent any actual activity in the real world, no other inputs or outputs are included.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/07:Mining of metal ores/072:Mining of non-ferrous metal ores/0729:Mining of other non-ferrous metal ores

exchanges.description: The amount of zinc concentrate required to substitute the zinc contained in the bulk lead-zinc concentrate is calculated based on the zinc content and dry mass of both materials.
